  var ViewBuilder = require('./ViewBuilder')

  var NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME = "GetSocialCordova";

  var ActivitiesViewBuilder = function(group, tags) {
    this.group = null;
    this.tags = null;
    if((group == undefined) && (tags == undefined)) {
 
    } else if(group != undefined) {
      this.group = group;
      
      if((tags != undefined) || (tags != null)) {
        if(tags instanceof Array) {
          this.tags = tags
        } else {
          this.tags = [];
          this.tags.push(tags);
        }
      }
    } else {
      return null;
    }
  }

    ActivitiesViewBuilder.prototype.show = function() {
      var option = this.toJson();
      if(this.group != null) {
        option.group = this.group;
      }
      if(this.tags != null) {
        option.tags = this.tags;
      }

      cordova.exec(null, null, NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME, "createActivitiesView", [option]);
    }

    ActivitiesViewBuilder.prototype.close = function() {
      var option = {}
      cordova.exec(null, null, NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME, "closeActivitiesView", [option]);
    }

  ActivitiesViewBuilder.prototype.__proto__ = ViewBuilder.prototype;

  module.exports = ActivitiesViewBuilder;
h
